comment: Kind of treats you like your I'm high school but the class is enjoyable. Four essays, lots of online and in class discussion. Attendance is required. Overall, easy class

Professor Taber really cares about her students. She makes difficult literature really easy to understand. I enjoyed going to class and really enjoyed all of her assignments. There was very little hw besides reading and she made it very easy to get a good grade. She's probably one of the best teachers i've had so far at KSU- TAKE HER CLASS :)

I loved this class, even though it Lit isn't my strength. Ms. Taber is a delightful lady, who cares about her students. She made seemingly boring stories come to life and seem pertinent to our day and time. We had fun discussions, and she uses technology to help with learning. I strongly recommend her if you want to learn and get an easy A.
Prof Taber was GREAT! I would jump at the chance to take her again. Assignments are clearly laid out and she is extremely helpful. TAKE THIS Prof!

Ms Taber is by far the nicest and most dedicated instructor I've had at KSU.  She is thorough and tells you exactly what she wants and when she wants it.  Her class assignments leading to all essays are so entertaining.  She extends deadlines when appropriate and is just a sweet-sweet lady.  Will take her a million times over!

Professor Taber is a very sweet lady. Her books that she assigns aren't expensive and are quite interesting. She gives you a large amount of resources to study and pass. She can be a little boring at times but overall I enjoyed the class.
easiest teacher and class i have ever taken. priced paid for books in class, under $25. no long papers just short 1.5paged ones. multiple choice tests. easy easy easy
Prof. Taber is an excellent teacher. multiple choice tests, no long papers, and online discussion posts determine your grade. I'd take her again

Prof Taber was one of the most interesting teachers I have had at KSU. you can tell she loves what she does, she is a very kind lady, spend some time talking with her, she is very knowledgeable. You are responcible for your grade. Post on the discussion boards, study the content she posts, read the books, and you will do fine. MC Exams.

Professor Taber is really nice and very approachable. She is not very exciting though. The books we read for class are easy and some are pretty good, but the class itself seemed lacking. She gives you a ton of information online to print out as  a study guide and to also aide in class notes. She gives trick questions on exams!! Watch out!
Really nice. Class is very clear. Tests are the other thing that's kinda hard. 8 short books, online discussions, NO PAPERS!

I LOVE Taber! The class was very up front and easy. Read the material and you will see the results in your test grades. I got an A in the class and I put in very minimal effort. Online discussions, mini quizzes [taken in class which you can grade yourself], and 4 tests and an optional final. TAKE TABER IF YOU WANT AN EASY "A"
expects too much out of her class...does not understand that its only a gen. ed. class and no cares about it...very unclear

She is a great teacher!  There are about 6 very small books you read throughout the semester and she goes through the entire book with you in class.  Only a 2 page paper was due which was extremely easy.  We had 5 tests and WebCT discussions.  TAKE HER!  Very nice lady.  Watch out for the wording on test questions though...she tries to trick you.
Her class is pretty interesting.  Tests aren't too bad but you have to go to class. Quite a bit of extra credit. Only one paper and she graded fairly easy.

Mrs. Taber is very sweet. Her class is simple. She tells you exactly what needs to be done. There was 3 or 4 papers that werent very long and they were easy. Attendance is important just because she will take points of your final grade for missing to much.

Mrs Taber is one of the best teachers Ive had so far ENG1101 and ENG2110. In Eng1101 she lets us take a week away from class to write our papers, then after we turn them in she grades them and returns them to us to allow us to fix them. Very easy class, def take her.

This teacher likes to do as little work as possible. We have in class quizes where your neighbor grades your paper...there is only one essay and it is 2 to 3 pages long. Attendance is mandatory, so dont miss. Her lectures are really pointless, if you read the book you will be fine. She is not that helpful, and does not let you make up assignments!

Who can ask for anything better than ONE 2-page paper!? Her tests and quizzes have purposely tricky questions on them because it's pretty easy... but in class, if we disagree with a question, she'll think it over and give us the points. My midterm went from an 82 to an 88 just because we disagreed with her questions. Very fair, in my opinion.
Take this class!! Incredibly easy and she is soo nice! If you show up you are practically guaranteed an A.  The only writing is one 3-page paper.

Great teacher- tells you exactly what's on the test- just take notes about the stories and read them.  She picks decent books to read- none of them are extremely long or hard.  Only one paper to write!
Ms. Taber is a very nice lady and she will do anything she can to help you in her class.  Do homework and write solid papers and you will get an A.  Would take again.

VERY cool teacher. Easiest A i've ever made. Make SURE you get on her good side. Shes going to give you a few assignments, but shes very lenient on the exact due date. by the end of the semester youll feel like shes a freind. Easy A guys, dont waste this one.
professor taber is awesome! she is such a sweet lady, she is pretty leniant. she does grade a little rough on the papers but i got a B on the 1st one. i enjoyed coming to her class. shes great!
She is a great professor!  Takes every effort to ensure you understand the reading.  Helpful! Got an A

This teacher BUTCHERED a few of my papers, but I am a senior now and I RARELY make below an A on any paper. She was tough, but if you actually pay attention to her, learn from the class, and do your work, it will definitley pay off in the rest of your college career! You think she was tough?? Wait till you get to REAL classes, not just Gen.Ed. junk
she's absolutely wonderful, she grades papers okay....and she explains stuff well and is really very helpful..so people stop hating just becuz u weren't ready to pull your weight in class
sweet, sweet, sweet teacher. cares about students great to have for my first college semester way back when!

Do not take her unless ure exthatic abt learning weird names and taking quizes on them every week. Do not be fooled by her easy lower level classes. World lit is what she lives for, and that will make your life hell. Also never bumbs up grades, 89.99 is a B. I wanted to become an english teacher until I ran into her...
Over arrogant and patronizing. She is very proud of herself, and expects you to be transformed by her intellect.

This professor was a fun and exciting teacher. But she did not play around with work that is due. She is willing to help you with your work just about any time and helps you write more interesting and effective essays.
Very tough assignments, but still very helpful

i loved this teacher and got an A in 1101 and i am takin 1102 right now and have gotten an A on one paper and B on the other. She gives prac regents tests and lets you revise almost every paper. only gives like 3 to 4 papers a semester. very helpful and gives outside research days instead of class.

i THOUGHT this class was easy, but even though i did well on all assignments, got a 100 on the final (a large % of the grade), i got a c. i emailed her 3 times and have yet to hear back. she is unreasonable no matter what your reasoning. i would recommend taking her if you like to suck up.

She's great, the best teacher you could hope for.  Classes are interesting, and she will really work with you if you ever need help.  She still keeps in touch and gives me advice, and it's been 2 years since I took her class.  Wonderful person.
she was an AWSOME teacher! I love her and would say that she is the BEST teacher EVER! :)

Took her and I was sick with a kidney infection but missed zero days of class, my grade was an 89.5 and she wouldnt knock it to an A.  She is very unreasonable.  Wouldnt reccommend her.  Take John Evans if he is teaching it.
shes rockin, cool activities in class, group work.  Not as boring as other english classes

Excellent professor. She enjoys her class. Not the average writing essays english class. More a discussion and participation class. No way you can make less than a C in the class unless you just dont do your work and dont care.I got an easy A.
